Uses of Class
picard.vcf.GenotypeConcordanceScheme

  • Packages that use GenotypeConcordanceScheme 
    Package Description
    picard.vcf  

    • Uses of GenotypeConcordanceScheme in picard.vcf

      Subclasses of GenotypeConcordanceScheme in picard.vcf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GA4GHScheme
      The scheme is defined in the constructor.
      class  GA4GHSchemeWithMissingAsHomRef
      The default scheme is derived from the GA4GH Benchmarking Work Group's proposed evaluation scheme.
      Methods in picard.vcf that return GenotypeConcordanceScheme 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GenotypeConcordanceScheme GenotypeConcordanceSchemeFactory.getScheme(boolean isMissingHomRef) 
      Methods in picard.vcf with parameters of type GenotypeConcordanceScheme 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double GenotypeConcordanceCounts.calculateGenotypeConcordance(GenotypeConcordanceScheme scheme, boolean missingSitesFlag)
      Genotype Concordance is the number of times the truth and call states match exactly / all truth and call combinations made If the GA4GH scheme is being used, any MISSING sites in truth OR call will not be included in the discordance calculations.
      double GenotypeConcordanceCounts.calculateNonRefGenotypeConcordance(GenotypeConcordanceScheme scheme, boolean missingSitesFlag)
      Non Ref Genotype Concordance is the number of times the truth and call states match exactly for *vars only* / all truth and call *var* combinations made If the GA4GH scheme is being used, any MISSING sites in truth OR call will not be included in the discordance calculations.
      java.util.Map<GenotypeConcordanceStates.ContingencyState,java.lang.Long> GenotypeConcordanceCounts.getContingencyStateCounts(GenotypeConcordanceScheme scheme)
      Returns the total number of times each contingency state is encountered, summed across all truth/call state pairs.
      double GenotypeConcordanceCounts.getSensitivity(GenotypeConcordanceScheme scheme, GenotypeConcordanceStates.TruthState[] truthStateArray)
      Returns the sensitivity defined by the scheme across the subset of truth states.
      double GenotypeConcordanceCounts.getSpecificity(GenotypeConcordanceScheme scheme, GenotypeConcordanceStates.TruthState[] truthStateArray)
      Returns the specificity defined by the scheme across the subset of truth states.
      double GenotypeConcordanceCounts.Ppv(GenotypeConcordanceScheme scheme, GenotypeConcordanceStates.CallState[] callStateList)
      Returns the PPV defined by the scheme across the subset of call states.
      void GenotypeConcordanceCounts.validateCountsAgainstScheme(GenotypeConcordanceScheme scheme)
      Validates that there are no counts for NA states in the underlying scheme
